reviews.review: Es abrirlo, entrar a un server online y viciar 3-4 horas a la noche. Super recomendado. Clasico de Clasicos

A game that lit up my childhood, ever since introduced I was extremely engrossed in this game. I bought the game once again since it was on summer sale and as soon as I launched the game I recalled all of my memories from way back when I was first introduced to the game. A treasure that will forever be cemented to our minds and hearts alike.
